com.loyauty.dao.mybatis
Class DaoManagerImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.loyauty.dao.core.AbstractDaoManager
      com.loyauty.dao.mybatis.DaoManagerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
DaoManager
public class DaoManagerImpl
extends AbstractDaoManager

Defines DAOs, manages transaction boundaries, and assures that database operations get executed using the same transaction (The SqlSession in MyBatis world).

Author:
Muthanna

getSession

executeAndHandle

public java.lang.Object executeAndHandle(DaoCommand command)
                                  throws DaoException
Description copied from interface: DaoManager
All Database access operation should invoke this method for it is designed to handle acquiring connections to the DB, committing and rolling back transactions, handling exception, and cleaning up the transaction garbage.

Parameters:
command - the DAO command used
Returns:
an object representing the returned result or null
Throws:
DaoException

Description copied from interface: DaoManager
